body_html:
@drpngx Do you think a change to the format as proposed (prefix, or suffix to the log message, not touching the [] part) would be acceptable?

@nutti It would be nice to get information about VLOG level in the message, but log output is often processed by script etc., so it is very easy to break users with any change to it.

body:
@drpngx Do you think a change to the format as proposed (prefix, or suffix to the log message, not touching the [] part) would be acceptable? 

@nutti It would be nice to get information about VLOG level in the message, but log output is often processed by script etc., so it is very easy to break users with any change to it.
